text: Ofan me amir asɨzir tuzir kaba, Israelian kalabus ategha ua izeziba, me bar uari inigha da ame. Ezɨ uaghan nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamizir igharaziba, me ikɨzir igharazibar arazir mɨzɨrɨziba ategha, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam fasa ifonge, a Israelian God, me bar uari inigha ofan kabar asɨzir tuziba ame.
